content:
# The movement command to position myself closer executed successfully. I should now be within the maximum distance to place the stone furnace.

# I will now attempt to place the stone furnace again at the desired position.

place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, Direction.UP, Position(-5, 5))  # Place the stone furnace upwards next to the original.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check the updated state of entities after placing the furnace.
